Parameters:
level - - 1 for led. 2 for buzzer

Parameters:
timer - - off timer in seconds (0 disables the timer)

setBroadcastRate

public void setBroadcastRate(int timeout,
                             int rate)
Update Broadcast Rate Function call necessary after active connection (handleConnect is true)

Parameters:
timeout - - Time in (100 equals 1s) after a connection times out
rate - - Update frequency (100 equals 10hz) / possible range is 10hz to 1hz

setLatency

public void setLatency(int latency)
Update Latency Value

Parameters:
latency - - 0 is no latency. 3 every third packet is sent etc

setPairingRssi

public void setPairingRssi(int level)
Minimum signal level required to pair to a device. This is used for security purposes by preventing connection to just any device. A function call will be necessary after the connection is active, if handleConnect is set to true.

Parameters:
level - - negative Level between -50 & -110

writeAdvertisementKey

public boolean writeAdvertisementKey(byte[] key,
                                     byte index)
write advertisement key to protect Advertisement Data Function call necessary after active connection (handleConnect is true)

Parameters:
key - - 16 byte key in byte []
index - - specific type of key

isDiscoverCharExpired

public abstract boolean isDiscoverCharExpired()
Detection if a characteristic discovery is exceeding the maximum allowed time

Returns:
true - At least one characteristic discover failed false - No discover timeout detected

isDiscoveryDone

public abstract boolean isDiscoveryDone()
Detection of all Services with characteristics were successfully discovered

Returns:
true - Device is fully discovered. false - Process is pending, not started etc
